title: US AI and Data Firms to Testify in Chinese AI Espionage Probe
contentSnippet: The U.S. is probing how Chinese operators used AI in a cyber-espionage campaign as experts warn similar tools could hit on-chain finance.

title: Avalanche ETF Race Heats Up as Bitwise Becomes First to Add Staking
contentSnippet: Bitwise moves its Avalanche ETF closer to market with updated SEC filing and becomes first issuer to include staking.

title: BONK memecoin debuts as ETP on Switzerland’s SIX exchange
contentSnippet: The listing brings the Solana-based token into one of Europe’s largest stock markets, even as memecoin valuations continue to slide in 2025.

title: Bitcoin has a 75% chance of short-term rally, says trader Alessio Rastani
contentSnippet: Veteran trader Alessio Rastani breaks down his bullish outlook for Bitcoin in the coming months in a new Cointelegraph interview.

title: Crypto Holiday Gift Guide 2025
contentSnippet: At a loss for what to buy the crypto fan in your life this festive season? Look no further than Decrypt’s holiday gift guide.

title: Trump-linked ALT5 Sigma shakes up leadership amid WLFI scrutiny
contentSnippet: The crypto treasury firm, which holds Trump-linked World Liberty Financial (WLFI) tokens on its balance sheet, has replaced two senior executives.

title: Solana analysis: SOL price unlikely to break $150 for now
contentSnippet: Solana struggles with recovery due to weakening network activity, a declining TVL, and negative ETF flows, as a classic chart pattern targets $100.

title: Hash Ribbon Flashes Signal That Often Marks Cyclical Bottoms for Bitcoin Price
contentSnippet: A historically reliable bottom signal appears after bitcoin’s 35% correction.

title: What’s behind the surge in privacy tokens as the rest of the market weakens?
contentSnippet: Zcash and other privacy tokens are rallying against a weaker market as regulatory pressure, delistings and AML rules reshape this niche sector.

title: Crypto for Advisors: Crypto’s Role in Portfolios
contentSnippet: Crypto's role in diversified portfolios: managing volatility, setting clear mandates, risk discipline, and the case for active investing and broader diversification.

title: UK Proposes ‘No Gain, No Loss’ Tax Rule for DeFi in 'Major Win' for Users
contentSnippet: The proposal, with input from major industry players, aims to bring tax rules in line with how DeFi works, reducing outcomes that don't reflect reality.

title: Bitcoin sees ‘significant step forward’ as $97K BTC price targets return
contentSnippet: Bitcoin gained fresh bullish BTC price targets closer to $100,000 on the back of a sustained rebound and encouraging futures market signals.

title: Spot Solana ETFs Post First Red Day Since Launch
contentSnippet: Solana ETFs recorded their first-ever outflow of $8.1M amid a broader crypto market recovery, breaking a three-week streak of inflows.

title: Justin Sun Doubles Down on First Digital Trust Fraud Allegations, Urges H.K. Regulators to Act
contentSnippet: Sun accused FDT of exploiting gaps in Hong Kong’s trust company regime and urged regulators to act after a Dubai court froze assets linked to the alleged misappropriation.

title: Bitcoin Whales Return to Buying for the First Time Since August as Price Recovers Above $90K
contentSnippet: Large holders return to buying after months of distribution, signalling renewed confidence at key support levels.

title: Fiat inflation drives crypto adoption across the globe
contentSnippet: Global inflation has slowed down, but in many countries, crypto is still providing an attractive and viable alternative to the local monetary system.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Bonk Teams Up With Bitcoin Capital to Launch ETP in Europe
contentSnippet: Investors can now trade Solana meme coin BONK as a regulated product on Switzerland's largest stock exchange.

title: Houdini Pay targets freelancers with privacy-focused crypto payment tool
contentSnippet: Houdini Swap launched Houdini Pay, a payment service that breaks onchain links between counterparties, offering surface-level privacy.

title: Malicious Chrome extension skims Solana swaps with hidden extra transfers
contentSnippet: A malicious Chrome extension called Crypto Copilot lets users trade Solana directly from X but secretly skims a small portion of the transaction.

title: BNB Holds Below $900 Level as Onchain Activity Slumps, Network Updrages Loom
contentSnippet: Price action remains stable, consolidating below $900, amid tension between weak fundamentals and upcoming upgrades.

title: Australia’s New Digital Assets Bill Seeks to Prevent Past Crypto Failures
contentSnippet: The Australian government introduced digital assets legislation to modernize its financial system and safeguard consumers.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Bitcoin Leads Broad Recovery as Traders Eye Possible Santa Rally
contentSnippet: Bitcoin and ether surged following Wednesday's tech-led equities rebound, while derivatives flows signal growing optimism for a year-end push.

title: 'Improving Risk Sentiment' Driving Bitcoin's $90K Retest: QCP
contentSnippet: Analysts remain cautiously optimistic, with Bitcoin reclaiming $90K as the chances of a December rate cut hit 85%.

title: Ark Invest Buys $16.5M of Coinbase Stock, Largest Purchase Since Aug. 1
contentSnippet: COIN closed at $264.97, 4.27% higher on the day, accompanying a relative recovery in the crypto market, which saw bitcoin gain over 3.3% to reclaim $90,000.

title: South Korea’s Upbit Reports $36 Million Loss in Solana Hot-Wallet Breach
contentSnippet: South Korea’s largest crypto exchange halted services and shifted assets to cold storage after detecting unauthorized withdrawals.

title: Australia Moves to Regulate Crypto Platforms Under New Consumer-Protection Law
contentSnippet: The new framework subjects exchanges and custody providers to financial services laws with ASIC as the primary regulator.

title: Nasdaq ISE Seeks to Quadruple Trading Limits on BlackRock's Bitcoin ETF Options
contentSnippet: The move marks a shift that would bring Bitcoin derivatives in line with major equities and deepen institutional access to the market.

title: Global Exchanges Urge SEC to Curb Broad Crypto Exemptions, Warn on Tokenized Stock Risks
contentSnippet: The SEC is being warned not to let crypto firms bypass investor protection rules as it considers exemptive relief for tokenized stocks.

title: Why Is Bitcoin Down? Blame Trump, Says Economist Paul Krugman
contentSnippet: Bitcoin critic Krugman says it's no coincidence that BTC is down, just as crypto-friendly President Trump stumbles in the polls.

title: 速報　コインチェック、仮想通貨QTUMの新規取扱いを発表
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨取引所コインチェックは25日、Qtum（QTUM）の新規取扱いを発表した。2019年11月にステラ・ルーメン（XLM）を追加してから3ヶ月ぶり。取り扱い銘柄は計12種類になった。

title: 米国版バイナンス、仮想通貨Qtum （QTUM）を新規上場
contentSnippet: 米国版バイナンスに、仮想通貨Qtum (QTUM)を新規上場。上場した仮想通貨はこれで計25銘柄になった。

title: 「アップルペイ」採用する全ての英店舗、仮想通貨Qtum決済導入を開始へ
contentSnippet: 英国の金融規制当局の認可を得たモバイル決済企業が新たに仮想通貨「Qtum」での決済を可能にしたことを発表した。アップルペイやサムスンペイが利用できる店舗での間接的な仮想通貨決済が可能となる。

title: アマゾン・ウェブサービス中国部門、Qtumブロックチェーンと提携｜仮想通貨QTUMの価格も上昇
contentSnippet: アマゾン・ウェブ・サービスの中国部門がクアンタムのブロックチェーンを利用する意向を発表した。市場低迷の中でもひっそりと大手IT企業のブロックチェーン技術採用は着実に広まっている。

title: 仮想通貨投資アプリCircleが新たにクアンタム、ステラを含む4通貨の取扱追加
contentSnippet: Circle Investが新たに4つの通貨、Qtum(QTUM)、0x(ZRX)、Stellar(XLM)、EOS(EOS)を追加すると発表した。今回の通貨は、今後の仮想通貨市場のエコシステム拡大にあたって、強力なインフラとなりうるものを選んだという。

title: 仮想通貨投資の銘柄を選ぶ上で、把握しておくべきの5つの分類と特徴
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨のポートフォリオを作るにあたり、購入した通貨がどのようなカテゴリー(種類)に属し、開発状況やロードマップを知っておくことで投資判断に活かすことができる。当ページでは仮想通貨を5つに大別、特徴について解説している。

title: 6月にハッキングを受けた韓国大手仮想通貨取引所Bithumbが入出金サービスを再開
contentSnippet: 6月のハッキング事件の影響で、入出金サービスを停止していた韓国の大手取引所Bithumbがサービスを再開した。今回の再開で対象となる通貨は、BTC、ETH、XRP、LTC、BCH、ETC、XMR、QTUM、ZEC、MITHの10種類。

title: レジャーナノ(Ledger Nano S)の使い方｜仮想通貨を安全に管理する方法
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨取引所のハッキングリスクが問題になる中、仮想通貨資産を安全に保管できるコールドウォレット『Ledger Nano S（レジャーナノS）』の購入方法や初期設定方法、リップル(XRP)の送金・入金方法など使い方を詳しく解説。26種類の対応仮想通貨一覧もあるので、参考にどうぞ。

title: 中国政府が28種類の仮想通貨に対する格付けを開始
contentSnippet: 中国政府が28種の仮想通貨の格付けを開始します。中国政府は最近ブロックチェーンの国家基準策定を発表もしています。

title: 仮想通貨を保有しながら配当を得る方法｜PoS通貨一覧と年間収益率
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨における主要アルゴリズムの一つ「PoS」。コインを保有しているだけで配当を得ることができる、PoSマイニング可能な仮想通貨一覧と年間収益率を掲載しています。
